events.name: US Sends Seized Ammunition to Ukraine
events.wd_label: US Sends Seized Ammunition to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The US confirmed sending over 1 million rounds of ammunition seized from Iran to Ukraine, although it may not significantly impact the battlefield.
events.description: The US confirmed sending over 1 million rounds of ammunition seized from Iran to Ukraine, although it may not significantly impact the battlefield.

events.name: Ammunition Details
events.wd_description: The US Central Command confirmed sending close to 1.1 million 7.62 mm rounds to Ukraine.
events.description: The US Central Command confirmed sending close to 1.1 million 7.62 mm rounds to Ukraine.

events.name: Interceptions by US Navy
events.wd_description: The US naval forces have been intercepting vessels and seizing weapons from Iran, believed to be bound for Iran-backed fighters in Yemen.
events.description: The US naval forces have been intercepting vessels and seizing weapons from Iran, believed to be bound for Iran-backed fighters in Yemen.

events.name: Ukraine's Weapon Needs
events.wd_description: The ammunition is unlikely to make a major difference for Ukraine, which needs long-range weapons and air defense systems.
events.description: The ammunition is unlikely to make a major difference for Ukraine, which needs long-range weapons and air defense systems.

events.name: Congressional Funding Status
events.wd_description: Congress did not include new funding for Ukraine in the recent stopgap US spending bill.
events.description: Congress did not include new funding for Ukraine in the recent stopgap US spending bill.

events.name: Foreign Nationals and Injured Palestinians Leave Gaza
events.wd_label: Foreign Nationals and Injured Palestinians Leave Gaza
events.wd_description: Officials confirm that foreign nationals and injured Palestinians have been granted access to cross from Gaza into Egypt under a deal brokered by Qatar.
events.description: Officials confirm that foreign nationals and injured Palestinians have been granted access to cross from Gaza into Egypt under a deal brokered by Qatar.

events.name: Injured Palestinians
events.wd_description: 81 severely injured Palestinians were expected to enter Egypt, with dozens already receiving treatment in hospitals across the country.
events.description: 81 severely injured Palestinians were expected to enter Egypt, with dozens already receiving treatment in hospitals across the country.

events.name: Foreign Nationals
events.wd_description: More than 360 foreign nationals have left Gaza through the Rafah border crossing, with many heading to Cairo to catch flights to their respective countries.
events.description: More than 360 foreign nationals have left Gaza through the Rafah border crossing, with many heading to Cairo to catch flights to their respective countries.

events.name: Brokered Deal
events.wd_description: The deal, brokered by Qatar between Israel, Hamas, and Egypt with coordination from the US, allows for the release of foreign nationals and critically injured civilians from Gaza.
events.description: The deal, brokered by Qatar between Israel, Hamas, and Egypt with coordination from the US, allows for the release of foreign nationals and critically injured civilians from Gaza.

events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain Guidance
events.wd_description: The Biden administration issued guidance to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for electric vehicle tax credits starting next year.
events.description: The Biden administration issued guidance to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for electric vehicle tax credits starting next year.

events.name: Guidance Issued
events.wd_description: The Biden administration issued guidance to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for electric vehicle tax credits.
events.description: The Biden administration issued guidance to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for electric vehicle tax credits.

events.name: Exemption of Trace Materials
events.wd_description: The U.S. Treasury temporarily exempted some trace critical minerals from new strict rules barring materials from China and other FEOCs.
events.description: The U.S. Treasury temporarily exempted some trace critical minerals from new strict rules barring materials from China and other FEOCs.

events.name: Trace Materials Exemption
events.wd_description: The decision to exempt trace materials for two years is significant for automakers to maintain vehicle eligibility for tax credits.
events.description: The decision to exempt trace materials for two years is significant for automakers to maintain vehicle eligibility for tax credits.

events.name: FEOC Rules
events.wd_description: FEOC rules will come into effect in 2024 for completed batteries and 2025 for critical minerals used to produce them.
events.description: FEOC rules will come into effect in 2024 for completed batteries and 2025 for critical minerals used to produce them.

events.name: Impact on Automakers
events.wd_description: The new rules and exemptions have significant implications for automakers as they make investment decisions for EV battery production.
events.description: The new rules and exemptions have significant implications for automakers as they make investment decisions for EV battery production.

events.name: GM's Position
events.wd_description: General Motors believes it is well positioned to maintain consumer purchase incentives for many of its EVs in 2024 and beyond.
events.description: General Motors believes it is well positioned to maintain consumer purchase incentives for many of its EVs in 2024 and beyond.

events.name: Ford's Position
events.wd_description: Ford is awaiting guidance to determine if its agreement with Chinese battery maker CATL would run afoul of the rules.
events.description: Ford is awaiting guidance to determine if its agreement with Chinese battery maker CATL would run afoul of the rules.

events.name: Senator Rubio's Criticism
events.wd_description: Senator Rubio criticized the guidance, arguing it allows the Ford CATL agreement to qualify and puts EV special interest groups ahead of America's interests.
events.description: Senator Rubio criticized the guidance, arguing it allows the Ford CATL agreement to qualify and puts EV special interest groups ahead of America's interests.

events.name: Senator Manchin's Criticism
events.wd_description: Senator Manchin blasted Treasury for allowing some trace critical minerals from China to qualify and vowed to reverse the proposed rule.
events.description: Senator Manchin blasted Treasury for allowing some trace critical minerals from China to qualify and vowed to reverse the proposed rule.
